taxon.author: (Poda, 1761)
taxon.distribution: Europe (not Scandinavia), North Africa to Middle East, Turkey, Caucasus, Russia (Europe to Far East), Iran, Central Asia, Afghanistan, China, Mongolia, Korea

referenceObject.reference: Poda, N. (1761). Insecta Musei Graecensis, quae in ordines, genera et species juxta systema naturae Caroli Linnaei. Haeredum Widmanstadii, Graecii [= Offizin Widmanstetter, Graz], 127 pp. (Araneae, pp. 122-123).
